text.data: Prologue The Downfall of Kahna Castle[end]K

King Kahna: Bahamut... Is this how things are to be?
I am unable to awaken you... Does the fate of Kahna lie in destruction?[end]
Kahna Dragon Squad Sky Fortress[end1]R
Rush: Let's go!![end]T
Truce: Captain! Give the order to attack![end]
The dragon-loving Cross Knight and captain of Kahna's Dragon Squad[end]T

Truce: If we, Kahna's Dragon Squad, don't stop the Empire...
Emperor Sauzer's world domination will be realized. We must not lose![end]K
King Kahna: Daughter... Can you sense Bahamut?[end]
The princess of Kahna, who speaks with the Holy Dragons and holds the power of a Dragnar[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: Father...[end]K
King Kahna: [character][0x1]... Can you... sense Bahamut's thoughts?[end]W
We must return to the castle!!![end][character][0x1]

[character][0x1]: Bahamut... Protect Kahna...
Protect [character][0x1]...[end]M
Mist: The Empire is attacking![end]M
Matelite: What is that Dragon Squad doing?![end]K
King Kahna: .........[end]M
Mist: Sire! What happened with Bahamut, Kahna's guardian dragon?[end]S
Sendak: The Holy Dragons must awaken. Without Bahamut we are lost...[end]K
King Kahna: That is not so. We still have [character][0x1] and his Dragon Squad...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]...[end]R
Rush: We're late!![end]R
Rush: We have to protect Kahna Castle! Before we attack, choose a name for the dragons![end]R
Rush: Okay! Let's go![end]T

Truce: We can't lose this final battle with the Granbelos Empire!
Captain [character][0x1]!! Shouldn't you go over the details once more before we attack?[end]
About commanding dragons About the stained sky No need.[end1]
About commanding dragons No need.[end1]T
Truce: That day, when the Granbelos Empire invaded...[end]D

Dragons move according to three commands.
[0x24]Go[0x22] will direct them to attack an enemy.
[0x24]Come[0x22] will make them return to you and attack nearby enemies.
[0x24]Wait[0x22] will make them return to you and heal you or rest.[end]A
An advance party has already headed to the enemy's sky fortress to hold them off. We must hurry to Kahna Castle. Captain [character][0x1], please get on your dragon.[end]T
Truce: Hurry, report to the king![end]B
Bikkebakke: Wanna hear some popular names?[end]
Yes No[end1]P
P-please don't make fun of my name. I'm Bikkebakke.[end]N
No. 1...Salamander No. 2...Spot No. 3...Dave No. 4...The name of a girl you like[end]B
Bikkebakke: There're tons of enemies outside!! Hurry up!![end]G
Give this dragon a name.[end]T
Truce: I'm nervous...[end]R
Rush: Ready to go at any time![end]T
Truce: The enemy's sky fortress was just a decoy. And we fell for it. We should've known...[end]M
Matelite: We don't need any of your excuses!! Follow me! We'll hold the enemy at the gates![end][end]
